text: Ramesh Deo (30 January 1929 â€“ 2 February 2022) was an Indian actor. He was born in Amravati, then-British India. His career began in 1955. His best known movie roles were in Aarti, Anand, Aap Ki Kasam and Mere Apne. Deo died of a heart attack in Mumbai, India on 2 February 2022, three days after his 93rd birthday. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Ramesh Deo
